Package ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.areagame

Class Area

java.lang.Object
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.areagame.Area
All Implemented Interfaces:
PauseMenu.Pausable, Playable, Updatable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ICWarsArea
public abstract class Area extends Object implements Playable, PauseMenu.Pausable
TODO

Area is a "Part" of the AreaGame. An Area is made of a Behavior, and a List of Actors

    • addActor

      private void addActor (Actor a, boolean safeMode)
      TODO

      Add an actor to the actors list and to the behavior area cell if the actor is an Interactable and to the interactor list if the actor is an Interactor

      Parameters:
      a - (Actor)(Interactor?)(Interactable?): the actor to add, not null
      safeMode - (Boolean): if True, the method ends

    • removeActor

      private void removeActor (Actor a, boolean safeMode)
      TODO

      Remove an actor form the actor list and from the behavior area cell if the actor is an Interactable and from the interactor list if the actor is an Interactor

      Parameters:
      a - (Actor): the actor to remove, not null
      safeMode - (Boolean): if True, the method ends

    • registerActor

      public final boolean registerActor (Actor a)
      TODO

      Register an actor : will be added at next update

      Parameters:
      a - (Actor): the actor to register, not null
      Returns:
      (boolean): true if the actor is correctly registered

    • requestAreaPause

      public final void requestAreaPause (AreaPauseMenu menu)
      TODO

      Can be called by any possessor of this Area. Caller indicate it requests a pause with given menu displayed. Notice: this method chooses if the request ends up or not

      Parameters:
      menu - (AreaPauseMenu): The context menu to display. It (or any of its components) will be responsible for the ResumeRequest, not null

    • attackEnnemyWithLowestHealth

      public int attackEnnemyWithLowestHealth (ArrayList<Integer> IndexOfAttackableEnemies, int damage)
      TODO
      Parameters:
      IndexOfAttackableEnemies - the indexes of the attackable ennemy units
      damage - the damage of the attacking unit Among the attacakble ennemy units, the one with the lowest health is found and attacked
      Returns:
      the index of the ennemie to attack in the IndexOfAttackableEnemies list

      Parameters:
      faction - the faction of the attacking unit
      attackingUnit - the attacking unit finds the ennemy unit and the calls moveTowardsClosestEnemy(ennemyUnits) on the attacking unit
